import React, { Component } from "react"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import Table from "react-bootstrap/Table"; import Badge from "react-bootstrap/Badge"; import ButtonGroup from "react-bootstrap/ButtonGroup"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; export default class TaskTable extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); console.log(); } render() { const level = (level) => { switch (level) { case 1: return Small; case 2: return Medium; case 3: return High; default: return No Level; } }; const tasks = this.props.task; const task = tasks.map((task, index) => { return ( {index} {task.name} {this.level(task.level)} ); }); return ( List Task
# Task Level Action
1 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit High
2 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Reiciendis ea c Small
3 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Reiciendis ea c Medium
); } }
